name: Terraform, Inc.
description:
In this simple and satisfying strategy game, you play as Terraform, Inc.'s newest planetary engineer. Your responsibility is to transform planets into the paradise of the client's dreams in 6 months or less, no questions asked!

Terraform, Inc. features randomly generated planets with 13 unique biomes. Alter the biomes present on the planet by strategically changing terrain into lakes, glaciers, mountains, and volcanoes. You only have 6 turns to meet the project requirements so every move counts!
